welcomeText: Empowering the digital transformation of Thessaloniki Port. Manage vessels, docks, and resources efficiently through an integrated and secure system.
aboutText: The Thessaloniki Port Authority (ThPA S.A.) is one of the leading ports in Southeastern Europe. Our system streamlines operations, communication, and efficiency in logistics.
vesselText: Manage vessel arrivals and departures, ensuring timely dock assignments.
storageText: Monitor and allocate storage efficiently to avoid congestion.
resourcesText: Oversee cranes, staff, and docks in real time with full control.
rolesText: Designed for agents, operators, and admins with role-based security.
